name: CreateIncidentResponderRequest
description:
Send a responder request for a specified incident.

This tool allows you to send a new responder request for a specific incident that needs attention and resolution. It should be called whenever additional assistance is required to address an ongoing issue. Proper OAuth scope is required.

parameters.name: incident_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the incident requiring a responder request.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: The versioning header used for specifying the API version to accept. It controls the format of the response.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the format of the request body. Must be set to 'application/json'.

parameters.name: user_email
parameters.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request.

value_schema.description: The email address of a valid user associated with the account making the request.

parameters.name: responder_request_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details for the responder request, including the requester ID, message, and target responders.

requester_id.description: The user id of the requester.

message.description: The message sent with the responder request.

responder_request_targets.description: The array of targets the responder request is sent to.
